message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think this is a fairer split, considering the value of the money is decreasing for me each round.  Let's work together to make this a good deal for both of us.
Bob, my offer is still on the table. This is a fair deal considering the inflation working against you. It's better to take a reasonable offer now than risk losing more in further rounds.
